wikipedia_page.main: Peter Day (20 August 1938 – 19 May 2020) was a British inorganic chemist and Professor of Chemistry at University College London (UCL).

response: *1999 Peter Day, The molecular chemistry of magnets and superconductors.
* Peter Day†, Fullerian Professor of Chemistry from 1994 to 2008, and Director of the Royal Institution from 1991 to 1998
In 1991, Thomas resigned as Director of the Royal Institution and the Davy Faraday Research Laboratory, to be succeeded by Peter Day.
* Peter Day (broadcaster) (born 1947), broadcaster on BBC radio
